ing: 2 (16 ounce) packages kielbasa sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces
n: Sweet and Oh So Spicy Kielbasa
des: "This delicious appetizer can be prepared in the slow cooker or right on the stove. Your guests will want to leave with this recipe!"
ins: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook the sausage in the hot oil until browned; add the barbecue sauce, grape jelly, pineapple, cherries, red pepper flakes, and cayenne pepper and stir; simmer 20 minutes.
